sourcesContent:
<template>
    <!--  :class="$i18n.locale" root element class to control fonts on each locale  -->
    <router-view :class="$i18n.locale"></router-view>
</template>

<script>

    export default {
        name: 'app',
        created() {
            this.setLanguage();
        },
        methods: {
            setLanguage() {
                const lang = localStorage.getItem('lang');
                if (lang) this.$i18n.locale = lang;
            },
        }
    };
</script>

<style>

</style>
